scripts.prewasm: mkdir -p dist; cp "$(go env GOROOT)/misc/wasm/wasm_exec.js"  "$(go env GOROOT)/misc/wasm/wasm_exec_node.js"  dist/
scripts.build:main-generate-group-type: (echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' ; esbuild --minify --bundle --platform=node --target=node16 dist/main_generate_group_type.js) > bin/generate-group-type; chmod 755 bin/generate-group-type
scripts.build:main-generator: mkdir -p ./bin; (echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' ; esbuild --bundle --platform=node --target=node16 src/main_generator.ts) > bin/generator; chmod 755 bin/generator
scripts.build:wasm: GOOS=js GOARCH=wasm go build -o dist/generator.wasm -ldflags="-s -w -X main.Version=$GITHUB_REF -X main.GitCommit=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD)" entity-generator/cmd/generator.go
scripts.test: pnpm run test:go && pnpm run test:js
scripts.pubdir: pnpm run build; rm -rf pubdir ; mkdir -p pubdir; cp -pr .gitignore .npmignore package.json README.md bin/generate-group-type bin/generator  src/payload.schema.json src/generate_group_type.schema.json pubdir/; cd dist ; cp -pr . ../pubdir/
scripts.pregenerator: rm -rf src/generated/wasm; pnpm run prewasm; pnpm run build:main-generator; pnpm run build:wasm
scripts.presmoke: pnpm run pubdir ; cd pubdir ; pnpm pack
